item.title: 【UPSCALED】2NE1 - Come Back Home [RTX HDR10 - 1080p]
item.description:
@2NE1 Well, this one is for your request. I re-encoded slightly with Lanczos Sharpness scaling, it should be looking good,
and about the color space and HDR, NVIDIA got you covered.

The melody actually giving me some goosebumps ))))

(and you really need a good HDR monitor to enjoy the richness to your bare eyes)
